description: Updates read permissions for a Amazon Q App in Amazon Q Business application environment instance.

parameters.name: instanceId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Amazon Q Business application environment instance.

parameters.name: appId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Amazon Q App for which permissions are being updated.

parameters.name: grantPermissions
parameters.description: The list of permissions to grant for the Amazon Q App. (dict) --- The permission to grant or revoke for a Amazon Q App. The action associated with the permission. The principal user to which the permission applies.

nested_params.name: action
nested_params.description: The action associated with the permission.

nested_params.name: principal
nested_params.description: The principal user to which the permission applies.

parameters.name: revokePermissions
parameters.description: The list of permissions to revoke for the Amazon Q App. (dict) --- The permission to grant or revoke for a Amazon Q App. The action associated with the permission. The principal user to which the permission applies.

nested_params.name: action
nested_params.description: The action associated with the permission.

nested_params.name: principal
nested_params.description: The principal user to which the permission applies.

nested_items.name: resourceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon Q App for which permissions were updated.

nested_items.name: appId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the Amazon Q App for which permissions were updated.

nested_items.name: permissions
nested_items.description: The updated list of permissions for the Amazon Q App.

nested_items.name: action
nested_items.description: The action associated with the permission.

nested_items.name: principal
nested_items.description: The principal user to which the permission applies.

nested_items.name: userId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the user.

nested_items.name: email
nested_items.description: The email address associated with the user.
